text:
vi#Saq maiShAMq ka~jcaqnOcCi#ShaH || 
marmA#Ni tEq varma#BiSCAdayAmiq sOma#stvAq rAjAq &mRutE#nAqBi-va#stAM | 
uqrOrvarI#yOq vari#vastE astuq jaya#ntaMq tvAmanu# madantu dEqvAH || 
yatra# bAqNAH saMqpata#nti kumAqrA vi#SiqKA i#va | 
indrO# naqstatra# vRutraqhA vi#SvAqhA Sarma# yacCatu || 20 
(dIqyAq - &dAqyO - ja#yantvaq - mitrAqn pra - ca#tvAriq(gm)qSacca#) (A4)
